text: Yearn2Learn is a series of two educational games for Windows and Macintosh by Americanhttps://www.mobygames.com/company/image-smith-inc studio Image Smith: Yearn2Learn: Peanuts (1994) and Yearn2Learn: Master Snoopy's World Geography (1995), based on the Peanuts series of comic books.http://www.relaunch.com/PDF/CS.Yearn2Learn.pdf == References == Category:1994 video games Category:1995 video games Category:Educational games Category:Mac OS games Category:Video games based on Peanuts Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games
title: Yearn2Learn
